page.title: Blog Declared Word of the Year
page.text: Blog Declared Word of the Year\\US Dictionary Merriam-Webster rsquo;s has announced that the word #8220;blog #8221; is their word of the year in their annual pronouncement of the Top 10 words of 2004, which also bizarrely included the words cicada and defenestration. Webster rsquo;s defines a blog as #8220;a Web site that contains ...
